SEARCH
Module info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.hello
Package info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.hello

Interface NewHelloServer

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, HelloServer
All Known Implementing Classes:
HelloUDPServer
public interface NewHelloServer extends HelloServer
Multi-port HelloServer. Per-port response format is specified as string, where each $ symbol should be replaced by request.
Author:
Georgiy Korneev (kgeorgiy@kgeorgiy.info)

  • Method Details

    • start

      void start(int threads, Map<Integer,String> ports)
      Starts a new Hello server. This method should return immediately.
      Parameters:
      threads - number of working threads.
      ports - port no to response format mapping.
